Policy.Comment: BEN: Benefit for the poor elderly/disabled (Benefício de Prestação Continuada)

Parameter.Name: Comp_Cond
Parameter.Comment: For those who didn't declare receiving the benefit, it is available if 1) household per capita income is less than 1/4 of minimum wage 2) person is disabled or over 65. We assume that per_sub% of households subreport their income (cadunico_rand < per_sub)
Parameter.Value: IF(cadunico_rand#1 < per_sub, il_CadUnico_sub#1/nPersInUnit#1, il_CadUnico#1/nPersInUnit#1) < 0.25*minwage & (IsDisabled | dag >= 65) & bdioa <= 0

Policy.Name: bpc_bra
Policy.Comment: BEN: Benefit for the poor elderly/disabled (Benefício de Prestação Continuada)

Parameter.Name: Comp_Cond
Parameter.Comment: For those who didn't declare receiving the benefit, it is available if 1) household per capita income is less than 1/4 of minimum wage 2) person is disabled or over 65. We assume that per_sub% of households subreport their income (cadunico_rand < per_sub)
Parameter.Value: IF(cadunico_rand#1 < per_sub, il_CadUnico_sub#1/nPersInUnit#1, il_CadUnico#1/nPersInUnit#1) < 0.25*minwage & (IsDisabled | dag >= 65) & bdioa <= 0
